place_brief_desc: The capital of fashion and design in Italy is also a city with a lot of culture and history.
place_longer_desc: The capital of fashion and design in Italy is also a city with a lot of culture and history. Walk or take a metro to see some of the highlights of Milan, such as the Duomo, the La Scala opera house, the Sforza Castle and the Leonardo da Vinci's Last Supper.
